entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
